â€œZelensky doesnâ€™t believe in the positive outcome of the negotiations with Russia. â€œBut let them try, so that no citizen of Ukraine doubts that I, as president, tried to stop the war when there was still a chance, however small,â€ he said in a video addressâ€ (The Kyiv Independent, 27.02.2022).

On the 4th Day of invasion of Ukraine from the Russian Federation and Belarus. There been talks of a peace-talk or a meeting on a border point between Ukraine and Belarus. We know nothing about this meeting or what the parties will do.

What we do know is that Belarus President Alexander Lukachenko promised â€œcease-fireâ€ and no involvement of his forces in the conflict before and during the talks. However, there is reports of Belorussian paratroopers and in addition this:

â€œBelarus missile ruins historical building in Chernihiv. According to the UNIAN news agency, it was an Iskander ballistic missile system that was fired from Belarus and hit the 1939 building in central Chernihiv, a regional capital 150 kilometers north of Kyivâ€ (The Kyiv Independent, 27.02.2022).

So, it is not like the Russians and Belorussians are avoiding casualties or critical damage of Ukraine. This is clear indication by this reporting, as Belorussian army is just sending far away missiles to target Ukraine.

While the Russian armies are not really advancing or gaining territory. As there are reports of lacking logistical support and big losses on the front-lines. The Ukrainian forces is repelling the Russians on the front with huge losses of vehicles, weapons and manpower. Clearly, the Russian President Vladimir Putin is disappointed and reported to use the â€œnuclear optionâ€ to strike more fear. Because, the war isnâ€™t going to planâ€¦

The Ukrainian government is getting more united support from the world. While the Russians are becoming more alone and only has few selected allies who helps or even support their cause in the war.

Alas, here is the proof of the failure and quagmire of the Russians inside Ukraine:

â€œMOSCOW, February 27. /TASS/. Troops of the Lugansk Peopleâ€™s Republic (LPR) have successfully advanced four more kilometers into the enemyâ€™s defense, Russian Defense Ministry Spokesman Igor Knashenkov said on Sunday. â€œTroops of the Lugansk Peopleâ€™s Republic backed by supporting fire of the Russian armed forces have advance to a distance of four more kilometers into the enemy defense. Troops of the Donetsk Peopleâ€™s Republic have overcome the resistance of nationalist units and advanced six more kilometers. The settlements of Nizhneye, Granitnoye, and Gnutivo have been liberated,â€ he said. According to Konashenkov, Russiaâ€™s forces have hit 1,607 Ukrainian military infrastructure facilities since the beginning of the special military operation on February 24â€ (TASS â€“ â€˜LPR troops advance four more km into enemy defense â€“ Russian defense ministryâ€™ 27.02.2022).

We are seeing a murky way ahead. The war is continuing and the allies of Putin is coming to his aide. This being Belarus who are using their army and forces too. European allies are sending arms, weapons and monetary reports to Ukraine. So, they are not fighting alone and itâ€™s evident. As Russia is becoming more alone and has less option across Europe. This war is going to cost Russia and who knows what price. While Ukraine is fighting to be a sovereign and an independent nation, which we hope and pray that it will continue to be. Peace.

BTW: The resistance and resilience of the Ukrainian people is admirable. They are the heroes and the ones who is fighting a just fight. Their cause is righteous, as an imperialist and a dream of reviving the USSR is imposed on them. Where the Ukrainian people are supposed to just give way and let Moscow rule supreme. That is what Putin wants and he wants to control the sphere of Kyiv. Therefore, the Ukrainian citizens and soldiers needs the support of the rest of Europe. They are fighting for their freedom and liberty. Which we cannot forget here. The Russians and Belorussians are the invaders trying to take away what is rightfully theirs. Peace.
